# cmdsddfeitc

The packagae `cmdsddfeitc` is a research compendium of the research project Cognitive Mechanisms of the Defer-Speedup and Date-Delay Framing Effects in Intertemporal Choice by Bram Zandbelt and Roshan Cools and was run at the Donders Institute, Radboud University / Radboucumc, Nijmegen, the Netherlands. This research project was funded through European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme under the Marie Skłodowska-Curie grant agreement No. 703141.
    This research compendium is associated with a number of online objects, including the preregistration (https://osf.io/rzqh9/), data management plan (https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.4720978), cognitive task (https://github.com/bramzandbelt/itch_time_framing_task), and computational model (https://github.com/bramzandbelt/itchmodel).
